articles.description: The singer and broadcaster has apologised for making an "inappropriate and unacceptable" comment.

articles.description: Figures shared exclusively with BBC News show 504 reported offences took place in hotels in 2023.
articles.title: Children being raped and abused in hotels, police data reveals

articles.description: France's president says a second museum entrance will be built, while non-EU residents will also pay more to visit.

articles.description: Nuria Sajjad and Selena Lau died at The Study Preparatory School in Wimbledon on 6 July 2023.

articles.title: Cardiff: University confirms plans to cut 400 jobs

articles.description: Coffee shops, trains and leisure centres have been accused of excluding people by no longer accepting cash.

articles.description: The app's strong debut has shaken beliefs that the US would remain the unchallenged global AI superpower, writes the BBC's Marc Cieslak.

articles.description: Restrictions on surplus cash in pension schemes could be eased to get more money into the economy.
